title: Notice board
body:
Hey!!!
I totally think that a notice board should be created for teams. maybe only so that the team can see it (obviously)
I think that would make it easier to communicate to people as a team leader and it would improve organising ranked games.
and maybe the notice board is for the leader only, but then members of the team can leave notes only viewable by the leader... or it can be totally open...
i really think this would benefit alot of people! and teams!
but i really think it could be a great addition to the game.
ya know.
thanks for your time :D

replies.body:
* I think this is what the [clubs](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/social.html) are going to be for. 
* Alternatively, you could set up a [discord server](https://discordapp.com).
* Some people even create groups through Facebook (once you know each other well enough).

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PAjbQOEM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-10T01:44:39.325+0000)
>
> * I think this is what the [clubs](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/social.html) are looking to do. 
> * Alternatively, you could set up a [discord server](https://discordapp.com).
> * Some people even create groups through Facebook (once you know each other well enough).

See thats why i think a notice board on the team page would be good. Facebook is too personal. But if its just like a little 'sticky note' sized page on the team page, that keeps communication within the game..

When clubs come out you will have a little chatroom all to your team. You also have the power to moderate your chatroom. It will be a sticky note sized chatroom inclient, much like the current chatrooms (lfg, noob, gameplay & strategy). 

In terms of leaving notes so people can see them when they log in, I'm not sure if clubs is going to have that function. In that case, discord is really good. It notifies you of new messages when you log in, you can have DM to players, you can set up multiple text chatrooms (game related, banter, etc) and multiple voice channels as well.

It even has an ingame overlay so you can keep connected while in game.
